description: Top this fluffy pancake recipe with cinnamon apples, banana or any of your favourite pancake toppings. Donâ€™t forget the maple syrup!
keywords: Sweet pancake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Video,Sesame free,High protein,Soy free,Tamara,Vegetarian,Apple,Peanut free
name: Fluffy Pancakes With Maple & Cinnamon Apples Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup maple syrup, plus extra to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Sift flour and bicarbonate of soda into a mixing bowl. Stir in sugar, then make a well in the centre. In a large jug, whisk together milk, eggs and vanilla. Pour into well, then stir until smooth.

Heat a frying pan over medium heat. Brush pan with a little butter, then pour 1/4 cup batter into pan, carefully spreading to form a 12cm round. Cook for 2 minutes or until bubbles appear. Turn over and cook for 1 minute or until golden and cooked through. Repeat with remaining batter, brushing pan with butter when necessary, to make a total of 12 pancakes.

To make the maple & cinnamon apples, melt butter in a small frying pan over medium heat. Add apple, tossing occasionally, for 5 minutes or until slightly golden. Add cinnamon and maple syrup, and cook for a further 1 minute or until apples are caramelised. Serve immediately with pancakes and extra maple syrup.
